item.title: Fortinet Guest Wifi with Captive Portal
item.description: FortiGate support guest Wi-Fi with a captive portal with the portal being the FortiGate itself. The following two login methods can be used: Captive portal login with username/password provided to guest users:Accounts are created in bulk on the FortiGate and printed to be provided to end users (e.g., by reception). Captive portal login with guestsâ€™ email address only:This is a less preferred option. Email collection can be done from FortiGate and exported for marketing use if a certain legal agreement allow it.
